original_text: Then King Nebuchadnezzar fell prostrate before Daniel and paid him honor and ordered that an offering and incense be presented to him.
korean_text: 이에 느부갓네살 왕이 엎드려 다니엘에게 절하고 명하여 예물과 향품을 그에게 주게 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then King Nebuchadnezzar fell prostrate before Daniel
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 느부갓네살 왕은 다니엘 앞에 엎드렸고

sentences.original_text: and ordered that an offering and incense
